If you need a pickup prior to June 8th please call 716-536-5775 or 209-6321.

The first presentation in our Mental Health Awareness series is tonight, Jan. 15th at 6:30 p.m. in the Orchard Park High School Auditorium

Parent Information Series on Mental & Emotional Health
More Than Sad: Suicide Prevention for parents
Presented by: Missy Stolfi, Director of the WNY branch of the American Foundation for Suicide Prevention

Parents will learn how to:
Recognize the signs of depression and other mental health problems;
Understand concerning behaviors;
Initiate a conversation with your child;
Get your child help.

The Orchard Park Central School District will offer two free opportunities for parents or community members to attend the More Than Sad presentation.
Both sessions will be the same. Please attend the session that best suits your schedule. Light refreshments will be provided by CCPTO.

The first session is January 15th at 6:30 p.m. in the Orchard Park High School Auditorium.

The second session is January 31st at 6:30 p.m. in the Orchard Park Middle School Auditorium.
